com.mongodb
Class BasicDBObject

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      java.util.HashMap<K,V>
          java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>
              org.bson.BasicBSONObject
                  com.mongodb.BasicDBObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBObject, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>, BSONObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommandResult
public class BasicDBObject
extends BasicBSONObject
implements DBObject

a basic implementation of bson object that is mongo specific. A DBObject can be created as follows, using this class: 

 DBObject obj = new BasicDBObject();
 obj.put("foo", "bar");

See Also:
Serialized Form
